name: Probably Poker
description:
Probably Poker is a card game probably similar to your average round of video poker. Its key difference being that the remaining suits pullable from each round's deck are revealed to you ahead of time; use that information however your liking.

There's also some health management and extra difficulty you've got to contend with. The dealer can deduct quite large sums of money from you if they happen to get a good hand. I hope you don't find it too daunting... The game will end in your defeat if you run out of either cash or hearts! Please be careful. 

At least if you lose you can post your highest score that game onto the leaderboards. Oh! But only on the downloaded version. I suppose I should have mentioned that somewhere sooner.

I've been working on this on/off for awhile now. It's the first game I collaborated with other people on for additional resources like art and music, so it finally getting finished is a decently big deal to me despite its small-scale. Such wonderful people involved include:

• PaperDawN for Art

• Random-storykeeper for Music

• Adi Keltsh for Sound Effects
